name: Arcane Bomb
description: Hurl a mass of volatile arcane energy that explodes on impact, dealing MAGIC EFFORT to all CLOSE targets at the point of detonation.

name: Arcane Missile
description: Fire a bolt of pure arcane energy at a target you can see. Roll INT to hit, deal MAGIC EFFORT on a success. A reliable, basic attack spell.

name: Arn's Hex
description: Curse a target you can see. The target's next roll is HARD. A simple but effective jinx to tip the scales.

name: Aazul's Conjuration
description: Conjure a non-magical object from thin air that fits in one hand. The object lasts until the end of your next turn, then vanishes.

name: Blade Aura
description: Surround yourself with spinning arcane blades. Any enemy that moves CLOSE to you takes MAGIC EFFORT damage.

name: Control Machines
description: Take command of a mechanical device or construct you can see. The machine obeys your mental commands for the duration.

name: Counter Spell
description: As a reaction, negate a spell being cast by a target you can see. Roll INT against the caster's INT to successfully counter.

name: Create Device
description: Using available materials, magically assemble a small mechanical device. The device can perform one simple function of your design.

name: Crystal Sanctuary
description: Encase yourself in a shell of magical crystal. You cannot act or be harmed while inside. The crystal has 1 HEART and can be shattered.

name: Curse of Ord
description: Place a lasting curse on a target you can touch. The cursed creature has -1 to all rolls until the curse is removed by magical means.

name: Death Nova
description: Release a burst of necrotic energy around you. All CLOSE enemies take MAGIC EFFORT damage. Undead in range are destroyed instantly.

name: Destroy the Dead
description: Target any undead creature you can see. Deal ULTIMATE EFFORT to the target. If this reduces it to 0 HP, it is destroyed utterly.

name: Detect Evil
description: Sense the presence and direction of evil creatures, cursed objects, or unholy magic within FAR range. Duration lasts 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Dominate Monster
description: Seize control of a monster's mind. Roll INT against the target's WIS. On success, control the creature for 1D4 ROUNDS. It obeys your commands.

name: Doorway
description: Create a magical portal on a flat surface that opens to the other side. The doorway lasts 1 ROUND and can be used by anyone.

name: Fireball
description: Hurl a ball of fire at a point you can see. It explodes on impact, dealing MAGIC EFFORT to all targets NEAR the point of detonation.

name: Fire Missile
description: Launch a streak of fire at a target you can see. Roll INT to hit, deal MAGIC EFFORT. Ignites flammable objects on contact.

name: Growth Ray
description: Fire a ray that doubles the size of a target creature or object for 1D4 ROUNDS. Grown creatures gain +1 to STR and CON rolls.

name: Hammer Stone
description: Magically hurl a stone with tremendous force at a target you can see. Deal WEAPON EFFORT on a hit. The stone shatters on impact.

name: Identify
description: Touch an object or creature and learn its magical properties, curses, enchantments, or hidden qualities. Reveals all magical information.

name: Illusory Self
description: Create an illusory duplicate of yourself NEAR you. The illusion mimics your movements. Attacks against you have a 50% chance of hitting the illusion instead.

name: Levitation
description: Lift yourself or a willing target off the ground. Float up to FAR height. Movement is slow and deliberate. Lasts 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Lightning Bolt
description: Unleash a bolt of lightning in a straight line from your hand. All targets in the line take MAGIC EFFORT damage. Strikes up to FAR range.

name: Mage Eye
description: Conjure an invisible, floating eye you can see through. The eye can fly up to FAR range and move through small openings. Lasts 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Mender
description: Repair a broken or damaged non-magical object by touching it. The object is restored to working condition. Cannot restore destroyed objects.

name: Mind Trap
description: Lock a target's mind in a psychic prison. The target is stunned for 1 ROUND, unable to take any actions. Roll INT against target's WIS.

name: Shrink Ray
description: Fire a ray that halves the size of a target creature or object for 1D4 ROUNDS. Shrunk creatures have -1 to STR and CON rolls.

name: Song of the Mountain
description: Sing or hum a deep resonating tone. All NEAR allies gain +1 to STR and CON rolls for the duration. Requires concentration.

name: The Hidden
description: Bend light and sound around yourself, becoming invisible. The effect ends if you attack, cast a spell, or take damage. Lasts 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Translocate
description: Instantly teleport yourself to any location you can see within FAR range. You arrive silently and can act normally on your next turn.

name: Vampiric Ray
description: Fire a dark ray at a target you can see. Deal MAGIC EFFORT damage. You heal for the amount of damage dealt. A parasitic attack spell.

name: Elemental Air
description: Command the element of air. Create gusts of wind, breathe underwater, or hurl blasts of pressurized air at enemies dealing MAGIC EFFORT.

name: Elemental Earth
description: Command the element of earth. Shape stone, cause tremors, or hurl boulders at enemies dealing WEAPON EFFORT.

name: Elemental Fire
description: Command the element of fire. Ignite objects, create walls of flame, or hurl fire at enemies dealing MAGIC EFFORT.

name: Elemental Ice
description: Command the element of ice. Freeze surfaces, create barriers of ice, or hurl shards at enemies dealing MAGIC EFFORT.

name: Elemental Beast
description: Summon a beast formed from a chosen element. The beast fights for you, has 1 HEART, and acts on your turn with +2 to rolls.

name: Elemental Storm
description: Call down a storm of elemental fury in a NEAR area. All enemies in the area take MAGIC EFFORT each ROUND. Requires concentration.

name: Elemental Vortex
description: Create a swirling vortex of elemental energy at a point you can see. Enemies NEAR the vortex are pulled toward it and take MAGIC EFFORT.

name: Elemental Water
description: Command the element of water. Control currents, breathe underwater, create water from nothing, or blast enemies with jets dealing MAGIC EFFORT.

name: Radiant Shield
description: Conjure a shield of radiant light. Block incoming attacks with a WIS roll. On success, negate damage and deal MAGIC EFFORT to the attacker.

name: Healing Nova
description: Release a burst of healing energy. All NEAR allies recover MAGIC EFFORT worth of HP. Cannot exceed maximum HP.

name: Healing Touch
description: Touch a creature and restore HP equal to MAGIC EFFORT. A simple, reliable healing spell usable on any living creature.

name: Holy Bulwark
description: Surround yourself or an ally with divine armor. Reduce all damage taken by 1 for 1D4 ROUNDS. Stacks with physical armor.

name: Invulnerability
description: For 1 ROUND, a touched ally becomes immune to all damage. They can still act normally. Cannot be extended or recast on the same target.

name: Cleanse
description: Remove one negative condition from a creature you can touch: poison, disease, blindness, curse, or fear. One condition per cast.

name: Lion Heart
description: Fill a creature you touch with divine courage. The target is immune to fear effects and gains +2 to CHA rolls for 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Regeneration
description: Touch a creature and grant it regenerative power. The target recovers BASIC EFFORT HP at the start of each turn for 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Resurrection
description: Touch a creature that has died within the last ROUND. That creature returns to life with 1 HP. Can only be used once per target.

name: Yogi Stasis
description: Enter a deep meditative trance. While in stasis, you do not age, breathe, eat, or drink. You are aware of your surroundings and can exit at will.

name: Far Seer
description: Enter a trance and project your senses to a distant location you have visited before. See and hear as if you were there. Lasts 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Quickness
description: Bless a creature you can touch with supernatural speed. The target can MOVE twice and still take an action on their turn for 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Astral Connection
description: Open a telepathic link with a creature you can see. Communicate mentally for 1D4 ROUNDS. The link works both ways.

name: Atom Palm
description: Strike with an open palm charged with cosmic energy. Deal ULTIMATE EFFORT to a single CLOSE target. Requires a DEX roll to hit.

name: Astral Self
description: Project your astral form out of your body. Your physical body is unconscious and vulnerable. Your astral form can fly, pass through walls, and observe.

name: Wild Growth
description: Cause rapid plant growth in a NEAR area. Vines, roots, and foliage erupt from the ground, creating difficult terrain and cover.

name: Vine Whip
description: Conjure a thorny vine that lashes out at a NEAR target. Deal MAGIC EFFORT damage and pull the target CLOSE to you on a hit.

name: Enchant
description: Imbue a weapon or piece of equipment with magical energy. The item gains +1 to relevant rolls for 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Animal Friend
description: Communicate with and calm a natural animal you can see. The animal becomes friendly and may follow simple commands for 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Woodshaper
description: Shape and mold wood as if it were clay. Create simple wooden objects, reshape trees, or seal wooden doors. The effect is permanent.

name: Dire Form
description: Transform into a dire version of a natural animal. You gain the animal's abilities, 1 extra HEART, and +2 to STR rolls. Lasts 1D4 ROUNDS.

name: Forager
description: Magically locate food, water, and medicinal herbs in any natural environment. Enough sustenance for a full party is found within 1 ROUND.

name: Gathering Stone
description: Enchant a stone that, when placed, creates a zone of comfort and safety in a NEAR radius. Allies resting near it recover double HP from rest.

name: Arc Arrow
description: You enhance 1 ordinary projectile with the ability to skip like rocks. Each time you roll a hit with the enhanced ammunition, make another attack against an additional NEAR enemy. There is no limit to the number of ricochet attacks.
flavor: The supposed record is held by Ivan the Boneless, who skipped an arrow through 16 orc warriors. He did not live to enjoy the holding of that record.

name: Attractor
description: Conjure a localized gravity well. All NEAR must pass a STR save or be pulled directly toward it. Colliding creatures take 1D6 WEAPON damage per POWER. Any movement within the area of effect requires a STR check.
flavor: This spell creates a razor-thin disc of gravity, linked to a black hole. The pull is strong enough to shatter steel, disassemble masonry, or tear arms from sockets.

name: Disruptor Ray
description: Speak 'DIENDE MORTIFERUM' and a vein of light shoots from your hand, agitating the cosmic field around your victim. For that target, ATTACKING and MOVEMENT are cancelled utterly until the SPELL ends.
flavor: Few things are more infuriating than being held like an infant in an invisible prison, unable to carry out wrath or ruin.

name: Fog
target: NEAR RADIUS AT FAR RANGE, +1 CATEGORY RADIUS/POWER
description: By changing the relationship of air and vapor, you form a mass of cool, opaque fog with an open hand and a sound of air moving. The fog conceals movement, stifles flames, and settles onto surfaces in damp condensation.
flavor: Their party emerged from an unnatural fog on a clear night, stole the crown in the confusion, and vanished with the breeze. Tricksters.

name: Mutagen
description: Create a powerful POTION that amplifies a creature's innate abilities. When consumed, this elixir takes all STAT bonus points and combines them onto a SINGLE STAT of the caster's choice. The target's innate nature becomes exaggerated, all other STATS drop to +0. This is accompanied by physical deformities. The POTION is highly unstable and will spoil after 1 ROUND if unused.
flavor: Gunder was always strong, but the mutagen made him a hulking beast, clumsy and dim as a mountain stone, green, lumpy, and always late for breakfast.

name: Oubliette
description: You conjure a small extra-dimensional chamber of stone. Cast this SPELL underground. A locking trapdoor appears, opens to a 20-foot square room. All contents are ejected and the hatch vanishes when the SPELL ends.
flavor: In the right moment, a damp hidey-hole is better than a fortified castle. Some say OUBLIETTE was used to escape Splinter, but none know how.

name: Phase
description: Your physical form briefly becomes astral. You are invisible, silent, and pass through material objects. Only MAGIC attacks can harm you. If you are inside an object when this SPELL ends, you are ejected and take ULTIMATE damage.
flavor: A wizard must take great caution while walking in the astral, even for a split second. Often, one does not walk alone in that baffling place.

name: Raven Prism
description: You summon a raven that is linked to your soul. It flies FAR and can move in and out of the Astral Dimension in wisps of smoke. It has one HEART and disappears if killed. You can treat the raven as yourself when calculating SPELL range.
flavor: The raven is formed from its summoner's shadow and does not cast a shadow of its own, save the darkness of its unearthly gaze.

name: Repeat
description: You replicate the very substance of time. Choose a specific event, such as 'an arrow struck that orc.' For the duration of the SPELL, if that event happens within range, the event repeats itself each TURN.
flavor: The door slammed on him once, twice, three times, again... by the end of it, he wished he hadn't even walked in to the Soggy Shingle Tavern.

name: Swiftness
description: Create 1 use of a speed POTION. Your movement blurs. MOVE twice your normal distance, and make an ATTEMPT on your turn, even after a double MOVE.
flavor: Swiftness can be learned the old way, or simply by a lightning strike to the brain.

name: Unlock
description: By reversing or advancing a micro-nodule of time, you can move padlocks, bars, gates or other locking type mechanisms to either locked or unlocked states. Larger locks like castle gates require a POWER 3 or higher cast to affect.
flavor: The first SPELL mastered by those who traverse the prison world of Splinter.

name: Unravel
description: Fast forward the time state for an object, vastly accelerating the effects of wear, rot, rust or decay. Age a thing 25 years per POWER.
flavor: Time wizards do the strangest things. I once saw a mage turn a table to sawdust by aging it a century in seconds.

name: Zeke's Last Dance
description: Dance with bizarre, convulsive movements. Those who see you do so must roll CHA against your INT roll or be ensorcelled, joining in. They can repeat this ATTEMPT on their TURN. If they fail, they can take no other ACTIONS.
flavor: His arms waved like mad, like a dying fish. His eyes bugged and his feet slid side to side. It was comical, frightening, and mesmeric.

name: Ant Venom
description: Create a terribly potent poison from thin air. Create 1 drop per POWER. Each drop, whether touched or ingested, inflicts 1D6 damage of burning, itching pain. The fluid can be used on knives or arrows, or placed on food.
flavor: Conjured venom is magical in nature, and therefore concentrated.

name: Depths
description: True darkness awaits in deep water. With this SPELL, create a downward pull on any creature or object in water. The target is pulled down until escaping with STR or hitting the bottom. The pressure, cold, and airless hell of it does the rest.
flavor: Whether man, beast, or even sailing ship, the black fathoms crush them all to pulp. It is no surprise the darkest gods dwell on the sea floor.

name: Duranium
description: Rearrange the atomic elements of a non-living object into pure duranium. This is a durable metal that is almost impossible to destroy by non-magical means.
flavor: He revealed a remarkable dagger, with thousands of folds and ripples.

name: Frogs
description: Create 100 frogs per POWER. They can pour from a crack, fall from the sky, erupt from a bucket etc. They are normal pond frogs, and behave as any frog would.
flavor: Zeke's Guide mentions a secret formula to multiply the number of frogs created by 1,000. Thankfully, this formula has been lost to time.

name: Growth
description: All living things grow, but by accelerating time and expanding its influence, you can grow creatures beyond their normal limits--to enormous scale. Grow 1 creature you can see. Double its size per POWER cast. As an aside, the growth process can be painful.
flavor: Hinar, the tree man of Grey, was known to cast this SPELL on a dwarven companion. Few terrors in this world rival a 30 foot dwarf.

name: Lock
duration: POWER 1: 1D4 ROUNDS, POWER 2: 1D4 HOURS, POWER 3: 1D4 DAYS, POWER 4: 1D4 YEARS OR UNTIL DISPELLED BY UNLOCK SPELL OF EQUAL POWER
description: Using a wand, dagger, quill or claw, scratch an arcane rune in metal, wood or stone doors, padlocks or gates. That portal OR padlock can only be released with an UNLOCK SPELL of equal or greater POWER. No physical means can release or destroy the locked object.
flavor: The LOCK spell can be hazardous indeed. Not even the caster can release the manacles so enchanted without the appropriate UNLOCK spell. This exact problem led to the sad case of Herman Zinn, who languished in chains for 4 long years after simply practicing the magic in his laboratory.

name: Olfan's Overture
description: Roll to cast only once, then weave a dwarven folk song by humming, whistling, playing an instrument or singing. As long as you continue to do so, ignore 1D8 damage per POWER each ROUND. If you speak or cast another SPELL, the effect ends.
flavor: Olfan walked through the fires of Hell, whistling his tune... the flames could not defile him.

name: Phase Hold
description: Block out the interconnections to other dimensions with this SPELL. All creatures you can see can no longer use PHASE, Blip Modules, or any other means to move in and out of common material reality.
flavor: Phasing drives combatants wild, and gets men killed. By preventing this, even astral demons can be easily contained and destroyed.

name: Swarm Self
description: You separate yourself at the molecular level, transforming into a dense swarm of insects. You retain your overall shape if desired, but gain all the abilities of a small swarm. POWER can either prolong this form OR increase its mass to terrible proportions.
flavor: Anaxamon Anaximander cast this spell so frequently, his form eventually became permanent. Those who dared peek under his green hood, or look into his gleaming single eye saw thousands of tiny cicadas.

name: Grasp of the Ogdru
description: The Ogdru are chaotic gods confined in deep space. With this SPELL, you tap their power to conjure tree-like tentacles from water or rock. The tentacles are myriad and ravenous, barely under your control. Treat them as 1 GIANT TENTACLE per POWER.
flavor: Only fools and madmen tangle with the Ogdru. Their formless malice is beyond mortal minds, and craves only chaos and annihilation for all living things.

name: Molok's Machines
description: Molok was known to experiment with all kinds of mechanical monsters. This mutation SPELL changes a target, fusing metal elements into their bodies. Each machine feature, be it pincers, giant shields, or weapon shapes, includes abilities to match.
flavor: His method was precise, patient, complex and brilliant. He was also evil.

name: Petrificatum
description: This is a concoction that, once ingested, turns its victim to stone. There is no known cure, but the POTION is slow-acting. Casting with more POWER hastens the process by 1 ROUND, from a base of 5 ROUNDS.
flavor: This spell, an elixir, can be tricky to use on one's enemies in an up front fashion. That said, if the foe can be deceived into ingesting the mixture, there is no known means to reverse its petrification effect. This is how the famed and ancient 'Likeness of Haruo' statue came to occupy the town square of Gwadan, when a drinking contest went terribly wrong.

name: Glyph of Teleport
description: Etch matching runes in two locations anywhere in the multiverse. With an INT roll, use these glyphs to instantly travel between the two. The runes last until erased or destroyed.
flavor: One by one we read the runes aloud, and found ourselves on a desolate, twisting world of living stone and spinning stars.

name: Endless Spells
description: This SPELL is a passive attribute once learned. Using an infinite power source from deep space, channel SPELLS with innate ability. Any time you cast a SPELL with a modified 13 or higher, instantly cast again. This effect also disregards any time limits a SPELL may have.
flavor: Nothing is so destructive as damage using Seekers with the Endless Spells ability. Gods, the chaos.

name: Portal
description: Open a temporary gateway between dimensions or times. The PORTAL can be used by anyone or anything with no roll as long as it is open. Open the PORTAL for 1 ROUND per POWER. The caster must have detailed knowledge of the destination, anywhere in time or space or alternate realities, but is not required to 'have been there.'
flavor: He was the last to jump through, but the doorway snapped shut in a blink, slicing poor Harvin in two cauterized pieces. One here, one in the Astral.

name: Reactor
description: This SPELL changes any form of matter into any other at your touch. This becomes an 'infectious' reaction that will continue until reaching the end of the affected mass, moving at NEAR per POWER cast each ROUND.
flavor: The stone changed to gold, like a frost spreading on a pond. The reaction continued, crunching and hissing, until the entire wall was solid gold metal.

name: Time Warp
description: With sheer will, and ancient magic, you can bend time itself. Alter 1 ROUND of time per POWER cast. This round can be rewound, skipped, or held still. The effects of this kind of SPELL can be hard to predict, and even create paradoxes.
flavor: It is important to perceive time as a series of parallels, not loops and knots.

name: Xarasanth Memoria
description: Become a 'memory walker.' Not only do you gain knowledge of infinite timelines and possible universes, you can implant, remove or enhance others' memories of those times and places. Work with 1 memory per POWER cast.
flavor: Nature may be infinite, but our perception and memory of it is all we have. To manipulate this solitary link between us and the cosmos is true power.

name: Baffle
description: By entering the psyche and unleashing a chaotic stream of gibberish, you blunt even the sharpest mind. Choose INT, WIS, or CHA. The target's bonus in that STAT becomes 0. The target must roll WIS to realize it's under a spell effect.
flavor: In the debauchery of the Unseelie Courts, one never knows if it is wine or magic that addles the courtesans.

name: Breath of Udin
description: Call upon the All-Father to create a wall of blasting wind in a shape you control. The wind requires a HARD STR roll to penetrate or resist, pushing all objects and creatures away to a NEAR distance.
flavor: The still air erupted into a sculpted gale, blasting the bandits away, stripping the walls of thatch, and blasting every pebble from where Aldin calmly stood.

name: Chain Reaction
duration: UNTIL A FAILED ATTACK IS ROLLED
description: This spell is cast on a willing ally. The subject becomes charged with magical momentum, giving them tremendous attack power. For each successful attack by that ally after Chain Reaction is cast, they may attempt another attack, with no upper limit to the number of attacks rolled. Enhance the power of this spell by adding a +1 to the attacks in question per POWER.
flavor: Olaf was glowing red and orange like fire. The old magic was upon him. Once he unleashed the axe, he did not stop until the battlefield was like a hillside of cut grass. Nothing could stop him.

name: Durandel's Blessing
description: By bolstering the natural harmonic vibrations within a living thing, you seal the target's very soul against all magical ill will or injury. The target is immune to all harmful MAGIC. That target can still utilize their own MAGIC or SPELLS.
flavor: For just a moment, the mighty arcana of the cosmos turned a blind eye to my humble soul. No bonds held sway, no missiles pierced me, no demonic blood could poison my veins.

name: Ice Barrage
description: You hurl one volatile shard of ice per POWER, like glassy throwing daggers, into any NEAR surface in a cluster. The shards strobe with energy and explode on fuses you set, dealing MAGIC to ALL targets NEAR that location.
flavor: The Yrill shamans' final rite of passage is battling an ice demon. The victor leaves with two frozen horns. One is given as a gift to the master, the other is burned into a magical powder.

name: Lightning Lash
description: You conjure a whip of crackling energy. The whip has FAR range and deals 1D8 MAGIC per POWER. It also lashes its victims like a whip. Targets struck are pulled to CLOSE range with a STR contest.
flavor: It is said that Thoor, son of Udin, taught this battle spell to mankind in the First Age. The God of Lightning has no love of serpent folk.

name: Painless
description: You draft a gar-like brew that grants temporary immunity to all forms of pain. A creature that drinks this POTION also reduces damage taken by 4 per POWER.
flavor: A dash of gar, a pinch of grit, and stir with an iron spike.

name: Repel
description: You bend gravity waves into a hyperbolic sphere, creating a powerful repulsor effect around your SPELL's focal point. NOTHING can get CLOSE to that focal point for the DURATION unless the SPELL is cancelled.
flavor: I once saw a wizard cast ATTRACTOR and REPEL on an apple in a Khettish Tavern. The entire building was destroyed.

name: Rest the Dead
description: By carving the 'Skaradess' glyph in a corpse's flesh or bones, you can consecrate, release, and protect the deceased. They can never be raised as undead, and their soul will ascend to its destiny, at peace.
flavor: The kings of old are guarded, even in death, by powerful magic. No defilers will lay their claws in those hallowed bones.

name: Tongues
description: This SPELL expands consciousness, accessing true intent beyond words. The target can fluently speak and understand any language.
flavor: As the magic washed over Tamwell, the Mykonoid's bubbling hiccups transformed into eloquent oration. Their friendship only grew from there.

name: Unseen
target: ANY 1 SOUND, ALLY, OBJECT WITHIN FAR/POWER
description: Cloud the minds of nearby creatures, hiding allies, objects, sounds. The victims invent their own odd excuses for the blank spots in their view.
flavor: Everyone in the tavern looked right past the statue, as if it was never there at all. The arguments ceased, and folk didn't even have their own confusion to cherish.

name: Winged Spell Stone
description: Take any SPELL you know and store one guaranteed use of it in a small amber stone. Destroy to cast. The stone will hover near you, using no inventory space.
flavor: The mightiest wizards found ways to contain their very souls in hovering Spell Stones. What an odd way to spend the afterlife, waiting to pop out.

name: Apocalyptica
description: Use psychic power to implant visions of doom and catastrophic failure into the mind of a creature you can see. They are free to act, but plagued by doubt.
flavor: Zeke was known to not only crush his enemies, but to let them self-destruct.

name: Cleanse the Cursed
description: Place your hand on the head of the forsaken, cursed, diseased, poisoned or afflicted. Cast this SPELL with a WIS roll, and cleanse up to 4 of the target's conditions instantly.
flavor: There is no better way to win the hearts of common folk than to walk village to village curing the sick. Our world is built on such honest kindness.

name: Illusions and Wonders
description: Create illusions with detailed, hallucinogenic realism. Add 1 ROUND or 1 target per POWER. Victims break the illusion on their TURN with a WIS roll.
flavor: One of the most versatile, mischievous, infuriating magicks is the most simple: to make others see what isn't there.

name: Love and Lust
description: Congeal pure love into a glowing red tincture. After the subject drinks the potion, the next person they see will capture their heart utterly, to obsession.
flavor: Love is one thing, but this man was crazed with desire for the priestess.

name: Moon Changer
description: Shift the time state of planets to change the moon's phase. A crescent can become full, or a full moon blotted out to its new stage. The effect is visible to all who look up, and is no illusion.
flavor: To meddle with such titanic forces as MOON CHANGER is a foolish, risky thing.

name: Ray of Souls
description: Compress immortal souls into an energy beam of incredible power. The beam erupts as you cry the names of souls you have saved or aided in their ascension throughout your life as a user of HOLY magic. For each point of MASTERY, both in your normal MASTERY track and your HOLY magic track, reduce 1 foe to 0 HP with this beam of energy. The destructive effect moves in a straight line when cast, and cannot harm allies.
flavor: There is no fury like a soul giving its last cry before eternal rest. The mage who can harness this power finds the riptide between the role of savior and destroyer.

name: Water Wonder
description: Using any amount of liquid water NEAR you, conjure a being of pure elemental water. The creature grows, adding a HEART each ROUND to 4 HEARTS maximum. It fights for you, with +2 on all rolls. It includes all the behaviors of normal water.
flavor: Garland defeated us with his blasted Water Wonders. The things were relentless, and he called them all simply 'Bubbles.'

name: Again
description: This powerful SPELL can re-fold the substance of time itself. It is the simple, incredible ability to say aloud 'it happens again.' For each POWER cast, during the following ROUND, at any moment, you can cause an event to repeat itself.
flavor: Altering time comes with impossible, disastrous effects. Simply repeating a single moment is miniscule by compare, but effective.

name: Astral Flight
description: Transform your physical form into an incorporeal astral entity. In this form, you can fly at twice your normal MOVE, penetrate solid matter, see and perceive all around you, but remain invisible, phased, immaterial and silent. Only energy or MAGIC attacks can harm you in this form.
flavor: It is reported that those who are injured in astral form retain strange multidimensional wounds. These wounds are irritated by ley lines and dimensional gateways.

name: Life
description: The power word 'Life' is mighty indeed. Speak this word with fury, and heal 1 HEART per POWER on a creature you can see. The target also adds their CON to the recovery amount.
flavor: Old Hinar was part treeish. That part of him, even after all the life and death he had seen, could grant a great boon of healing in time of need.

name: Mind of Metal
description: Armor your consciousness, or an ally's, with psychic resilience. With this armor in place, make an EASY INT roll any time ARCANE magic or fear effects are used against you. If you succeed, ignore that effect. Gain 1D4 ROUNDS per POWER cast.
flavor: It is frightening enough to enter another mind. To be rebuked from that place is even more horrible.

name: Murky Wood Melody
description: Sing, hum or play one of the oldest songs in existence. This song has the power to show the way. These words take many forms, including navigational beacons, clearing of darkness or fog, or the dispelling of confusing illusions.
flavor: Olfan whistled like a boy in a parade. As suddenly as we had become lost, the gloom cleared, the spiders scurried from the path. A ray of sunlight drifted down.

name: Winter
description: Open a micro-doorway to the dimension of Frost Fall. You are immediately surrounded, and emitting a cloud of freezing cold. It will continue to spread as long as you concentrate, with no known limit.
flavor: Some say the ice flows of Olo are the result of a years-long SPELL cast by a long forgotten wizard. He kept the door to Frost Fall open too long.

name: Enhance Spell
description: With this cast, upgrade any SPELL you know, effectively creating a new spell of greater effect. Since this is such a wide open set of possibilities, each cast of ENHANCE SPELL must be cleared with the GM. Enhancing a spell may even require certain objects, reagents, or locations to achieve. A small enhancement could be a single roll, whereas a legendary upgrade to a spell could require days of EFFORT.
flavor: The most powerful form of magic is that which powers itself, making more from nothing, and expanding the finite to forever.

name: Temporal Hold
description: With divine assistance, you can halt time itself. Freeze 1 ROUND of time per POWER cast. This ROUND can be frozen while you move freely. Objects and beings can be altered while time is frozen, and they will resume their temporal flow once released. Oh, the possibilities.
flavor: The most effective way to travel in time is step outside of it. A priest who sees this truth will know the faces of the gods.

name: Zeke's Ascension
description: This spell can only be cast with a 'BURN' option. Once cast, its subject recovers full HP and gains +1 to all STATS until the spell is cast again. In addition, the subject gains a temporary HEART of HP that, once depleted, is no longer part of their maximum HP. This spell releases so much HOLY energy that it sends a vertical shaft of light from the subject that can be seen for a mile.
flavor: Zeke was a cantankerous but altruistic wizard with an odd sense of humor. As keeper of the Tessaract Dagger, he discovered the deepest secrets of magic, but always returned to one central truth: there is no power in the multiverse greater than friendship, so to his allies the true essence of his skill was devoted.

name: Animate Dead
description: You cause rotted lungs to gasp, skeletal limbs to move. Turn 1 lifeless body into an automaton under your control per POWER. They act on your turn. They are very slow, have 1 HP, and do not eat, breathe, or bleed. The skeletons crumble to grave dust at dawn's light.
flavor: The only limit to a necromancer's army is the number of bodies lying around, and the ability to pay the cost in blood.

name: Bat
duration: UNTIL 0 HP OR REVERT AT WILL
description: You and your gear transform into a bat. You can fly, navigate in total darkness, and have 1 HP. If you go to zero HP, you transform back into your original shape with your former HP total. You can also revert to normal form at will.
flavor: Some sorcerers begin to prefer the shape of a bat and adopt odd nocturnal mannerisms in human form. They eat hanging upside down, prefer a nocturnal life, or even take to drinking blood. Even worse, some simply remain bats forever.

name: Bind with Fire
description: Fiery bindings appear, restraining and tormenting your foe. The target can't move and takes 1D8 MAGIC per POWER. If the target is from another dimension, it takes ULTIMATE damage instead, unless hailing from PYROS.
flavor: The fool who binds Flame Kin in such a way will find himself not only mocked, but marked for a smoldering death.

name: Bloodmist
description: By conjuring an explosive cloud of corrosive gas, you sap the lifeblood from one creature and give it to another. One target takes 1D8 MAGIC per POWER, and another target within NEAR of it, also enveloped by the cloud, heals that amount.
flavor: When the red cloud cleared, the mighty and the feeble had traded places. I only saw those glowing, laughing eyes through the clearing mist.

name: Wither
description: You extract the lifeblood of a creature, as long as it HAS blood, weakening it terribly. Delete 1 STAT point on your victim per POWER cast. These points can be healed by any normal means of healing, subbing a STAT heal for an HP heal.
flavor: It is a cruel thing to reduce your foes to hobbling shells, rather than simply kill them.

name: Melt
description: Vicious waves of heat melt non-living solids. Liquify 100 pounds of mass per POWER. That liquid emits searing heat at NEAR range for 1D4 ROUNDS, then cools into its solid form once again.
flavor: Fire dwarves use this magic to tunnel networks deep in the heart of simmering volcanoes, or fill casts with liquid mithril.

name: Molok's Mutation
description: With volatile, sloppy magic, you curse a creature with horrible deformity. The target must pass a CON save each ROUND or acquire a hideous mutation. The results are permanent. If your spellcasting roll is any odd number, you must also roll a mercurial effect for yourself.
flavor: Wizards learning to warp flesh are often their own test subjects. Not even the darkest hood or cloak can hide their myriad eyes and insectoid skin.

name: Plague of Doubts
description: Those afflicted by this curse can't differentiate between illusion and reality. They see their worst fears in ordinary objects, and terrible deformity in old friends. Any roll the target makes is HARD, and any roll against the target is EASY.
flavor: The crone relished doubt, fear, and pain. She granted boons to those with a talent for inflicting all three.

name: Zeke's Immolation
description: Use your own body as an incendiary weapon, surrounding yourself in blazing fire. CLOSE enemies take MAGICAL damage. Any beings still CLOSE to you on the GM's TURN also take 1D6 Ambient Heat damage. Ignites all flammables, terrifies villagers.
flavor: Zeke was a reckless, violent wizard that could not be contained. His love of fire earned him a place in the Pyros elite.

name: Bind Soul
description: Mark a creature with your arcane touch. When this creature dies, their immortal soul becomes yours. It can be used as a RARE INGREDIENT, a barter with the devil, or be expended to cast any SOUL magic at no COST.
flavor: Cold and merciless are those who deal in immortal souls. They take from us more than life, they rob us of cosmic absolution.

name: Burning Arrows
description: Condense the essence of an open flame into arrowheads. These arrows now do MAGIC, and ignite any flammables. They glow in the quiver, last until used.
flavor: Merra loosed her barrage, firing arrow after arrow in a glowing blur. When it was over, the behemoth fell to ruin, and we were among a true master.

name: Driven
description: Boil the blood of your subjects. The target will ravenously attack its current task, disregarding all risk or harm, to the task's completion. They are frantic with it, making INT, WIS and CHA rolls HARD, but making STR, CON and DEX rolls EASY.
flavor: The minions of the blood drinkers attack with reckless fury, skewering themselves to obey their dark masters.

name: Flame Blade
description: Choose a melee weapon you can see. Call upon the dimension of Pyros, and bathe the weapon in fire. The weapon now inflicts MAGIC, burns its victims for an additional 1D6 on the next ROUND, and ignites flammables.
flavor: I lifted Owlbane above me, and Anaxamon sheathed the blade in fire. The goblins fled. The goblins died.

name: Garland's Sphere
description: Conjure a lightless hovering sphere, 6 feet in diameter. The sphere can be sent in a straight line, up to FAR, or stay still. Unless all those NEAR it, besides you, make a DEX roll, they are engulfed in a field of anti-magic corrosion. This corrosion saps the magic properties from ALL magic equipment.
flavor: It drifted past us, silent and black as pitch, but swirling and alive with malice. Burning swords were snuffed, relics were made into junk. Damn you, Garland.

name: Glyph of Fire
description: Etch a glowing amber rune on any surface. Speak a command or condition to this glyph. When those conditions or commands are met, the rune explodes with a plume of flames. It will inflict 1D12 ULTIMATE fire damage per POWER on anything NEAR it.
flavor: At each doorway, Orvald would etch his little rune. We thought nothing of it. Then all hell's fire was unleashed on our pursuers.

name: Incantation of Fear
description: This slow-acting SPELL overcomes its victims with crippling terror. As magic goes, it is an oddity because it creates fear in a location rather than a creature. Place the curse. In 1 ROUND, a NEAR radius area to that spot is filled with racking, hideous fear. Anything entering that area will use its next maximum MOVE to flee.
flavor: The goblins scattered like rats, screaming and screeching, dropping their ragged weapons. We were all baffled, until we saw that sick grin on Zeke's face.

name: Possession
description: Call upon a lesser demonic spirit, devoid of a body, and place it in your victim's inner mind. This cruel SPELL must not be used lightly, as it can be impossible or fatal to remove the demon from the host via EXORCISM. Attempts to cleanse it must be equal or higher POWER. The effects of possession vary too widely to list here.
flavor: Our holy ritual failed, she spat blood and broke her bonds. We had unleashed something truly terrible on the world that night.

name: Shadow Form
description: Take the form of a smoke-like shadow, able to slide through the air, through tiny cracks, or on walls and ceilings. The shadow is only inhibited by airtight spaces and direct sunlight. Attacks against you are HARD and you become hidden with no rolls.
flavor: Stealth is an essential component to the devilish work of assassins and saboteurs. Thus so many of their ranks join with demonic forces.

name: Skull
description: Collect, study, and hex the skull of a creature with a SPELL. You must use 1 POWER per creature's MAX HEARTS to hex such a skull. As long as the skull is with you, rolls made regarding that type of creature are EASY. When damaging that type, add another of whatever damage die is in use.
flavor: The skull wizards of Skar carry great belts and necklaces of grim trophies. To steal or destroy these objects invites their wrath as a people.

name: Summoning Circle
description: Draw a glyphic circle on any surface, then speak the name of a creature or monster you have seen. 1 of those appears, per POWER, in 1D4 ROUNDS. The only monster immune to this summons is a LEY WALKER.
flavor: Gods above, the fool summoned four swarms of Imps! Madness!

name: Flame Vortex
description: Create a whirling tornado of pure fire. The vortex is 30 feet in height, and slides randomly around an area, burning anything it touches with MAGICAL heat, 1D8 per POWER cast. It can only be dissipated by a gale of wind, rain, or the absence of air.
flavor: We were fleeing Olfan's hideous library, and the coiling devil of fire kept whirling, burning books and shelves in a spinning hell of fire and ash.

name: Kill Unseen
description: Focus your will on a creature you have touched, and whisper its name. The creature will drop to 0 HP in 1D4 ROUNDS, no matter its location. Kill 1 HEART per POWER cast.
flavor: The most devious assassin is the one reclining in his sanctum, a hundred leagues away, closing his magical hand 'round his victim's heart.

name: Learn by Blood
description: Spare a drop of your blood, and etch new SPELLS into your very soul. When creating a SPELL, roll this instead of conventional SPELL CREATION rolls. Do 1D12 creation EFFORT per POWER cast.
flavor: Garland was a pale, emaciated skeleton of a man. He had given blood to learn many secrets, and never fully recovered from his studies.

name: Magic Bane
description: A forbidden ritual allows you to scratch a malevolent rune in any surface. This rune cancels all magic in a FAR radius until it is destroyed or erased. Devious wizards are known to hide it in key areas of their labyrinths.
flavor: Some dwarven warriors of Iradrum have this symbol etched into their helmets by a war mage. Their very presence in battle could break an army's magical defenses.

name: Scythe
description: A reaper's weapon. Materialize a bladed weapon of pure darkness. Any creature hit with a STR attack using this dark blade drops to 0 HP instantly. That target also rolls CON or loses 1D6 STAT points. If it misses, it dissipates instantly.
flavor: The greed to kill with this evil blade consumed our warrior. He became more reaper than man and we feared him in those tunnels.

name: Sound of Silence
description: Close your eyes, hear all that surrounds you, and with magical force, bring it all to a flawless silence. This SPELL suppresses ALL sound in an area surrounding you, 1 range category per POWER (1=CLOSE, 2=NEAR, 3=FAR, 4=EYESIGHT). Since so many SPELLS also use words of power, they are suppressed as well.
flavor: War mages would march in chevron formations, casting silence and counter SPELL magic in waves. Their enemies were deafened and utterly defenseless.

name: Transfusion
description: Your power over living plasma lets you draw blood from a living creature and transfer it to another. Both subjects must be above 0 HP and NEAR each other. The donor feels terrible pain, and absorbs MAGICAL damage, 1D8 per POWER, that cannot be resisted. The receiver heals for twice the amount.
flavor: The blood pulled through his pores, out his eyes, and 'tween the rings of his chain shirt. It was a hideous thing to behold.

name: Death
description: Rob a target you can see of its blood, instantly killing it. Drop 1 HEART to 0 HP with each POWER cast. If this SPELL is cast on a creature with 0 HP, they are killed utterly, leaving only a colorless desiccated shell.
flavor: Those who employ the Death SPELL darken, grow pale, and learn to hate the wholesome light of day.

name: Fire Wonder
description: Choose a living creature you can see. Immolate that creature with magical fire, transforming it into a juggernaut of flame. It becomes a horned beast, covered in fire, with 1 HEART per POWER cast. The beast has +2 to rolls per POWER, and is 6 feet high per POWER. Fire Wonders cannot speak.
flavor: To enter Pyros in the form of a Fire Wonder makes the condition truly permanent. This is a tormented, burning existence with no end. Terrible.

name: Forge
description: Use magic to forge metal weapons and objects with no anvil or hammer. Simply create the implement from a refined metal ingot of any type or quality. The item has +1 to any STAT per POWER. For each +1 placed into an item or weapon, the caster must wait that many days for their hands to cool.
flavor: Olfan was famous for making 'Death Blades' for his warriors: swords that could kill an enemy with a single stroke.

name: Horns
description: Imbue a creature with pure INFERNAL power, initiating a transformation of demonic strength. The subject sprouts curling horns at first, then over the course of 1D20 days will gain red skin, a spiked tail, black claws, and glowing eyes. They will also be accompanied by a smell of brimstone, and gain +3 to any 3 STATS, an extra HEART, and usage of FIRE MISSILE and RAY OF SOULS.
flavor: The boy was half-mad with grief and rage. He begged Olfan to give him the power to avenge his slain lover, at any cost. What Olfan gave that poor boy was pure devilish might. The dead could not easily be counted.

name: Vampire
description: This SPELL can only be cast at POWER 4. With a cast, convert one living or dead creature you can see into a vampire. Learning this SPELL curses you with vampirism. This is a permanent condition, with all the details and trappings of the vampire myth and all its forms.
flavor: Most believe that Dragool was the first vampire, but there are far older monsters in the darkest places, and they carry a hideous gift.
